name: Late Priyanshu Saini
bio: Late Priyanshu Saini was an inspiring figure in the chess community — a passionate chess player, professional coach, and International FIDE-rated player (Rating: 1535). As the Founder of The Chess School, Jaipur, he dedicated his life to promoting chess and nurturing young talents. His coaching excellence, sportsmanship, and kind personality left a lasting impression on everyone he mentored. Priyanshu’s legacy continues to inspire students and coaches at Chessler Chess Club, reminding us that chess is not just a game — it’s a lifelong journey of learning, discipline, and creativity.
memoriam: In loving memory of a true chess enthusiast and mentor.
